item.title: concurrency, garbage & performance w/ node
item.description: In this article I’ll discuss about how Node works under the hood by focusing on its concurrency and memory models, then talk about performance when writing APIs. Concurrency and garbage Terminology Concurrency model Memory model Diagram and clarifications The callback queues The heap Bindings and threads Performance Cost and cascading effects API and workers Caching Conclusion Concurrency and garbage Terminology Many words and concepts are thrown around when dealing with Node.
